Sprijin de Urgență is a platform where individuals can request or offer various resources such as food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, or volunteer services. It facilitates the provision and request of aid in urgent situations.

You can find more detailed information on the website `dopomoha.ro`. Look for the section titled "Sprijin de Urgență" or "Emergency Support", which is typically found at the beginning of relevant assistance pages.

Rescue 4x4 provides free public services for rescue, recovery, and emergency interventions in urgent situations. This includes bringing vehicles to the road or removing them from the carriageway to avoid disturbing or blocking traffic.

To find this information on the webpage, navigate to the `dopomoha.ro/en/transportation` website and look for the section titled "Rescue 4x4".

You can pay for subway travel in Romania by buying a ticket directly at the ticket office in the metro station or by using a bank card directly at the turnstile.

To find this detailed information, go to the website `https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation`. Scroll down to the "Transport in Romania" section and then look for the "Traveling by subway" subsection.
